meanings.definition: The act of inspecting something again.
meanings.sent1: The reinspections of the building ensured it was safe for everyone.
meanings.sent2: After the initial inspection, the reinspections found a few minor issues.
meanings.sent3: The reinspections of the cake revealed it was missing some ingredients!
meanings.sent4: Her constant reinspections of her work showed her dedication to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The reinspections of the treasure map led to the hidden chest.

meanings.definition: The process of examining something for a second time.
meanings.sent1: The reinspections of the documents were necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: During the reinspections, they discovered a crucial error in the calculations.
meanings.sent3: The reinspections of the puzzle made it even more confusing!
meanings.sent4: His thorough reinspections of the crime scene revealed new evidence.
meanings.sent5: The reinspections of the experiment results confirmed the hypothesis.
